name: site
description: A full-stack prototype that **automatically receives bug reports, classifies them with AI, spins up a sandboxed environment, attempts a code fix, and opens a GitHub Pull Request** â€“ all with zero human involvement for simple bugs.

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "bgBlack.white,bgWhite.black" "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
